name: Nameless Worlds
detailed_description:
Nameless Worlds is an open-world sandbox game with procedural generated, fully destructible environments.

Starting with your bare hands, collect resources to survive in the wildness. Build a solid home base and explore the world and shape it however you see fit.

Features

  • Procedural Generated Worlds
  • Completely Modifiable Environment
  • Currently 5 Different Building Materials
  • Currently 2 Items
  • Explore Various Biomes
  • Environmental Physics
  • Day-Night-Cycle

short_description: Shape the world, the way you see fit!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1GHz processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card with 512Mb
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2GHz Dual Core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card with 512Mb
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
